Dashboard.MarketCap: Total value of all minted assets
Dashboard.TVL: Total value of collateral, liquidity and staked LOOP
Dashboard.CollateralRatio: Ratio of the total collateral value to the total minted asset value
Dashboard.CommunityPoolBalance: Total number of LOOP tokens currently in the community pool
Dashboard.TotalValueLocked: Total assets locked in liquidity pools

Chart.Liquidity: Total liquidity provided from locked assets in liquidity pools
Chart.Volume: Total volume over the last 24 hours (swap + LP)

TopTrading.Liquidity: Current liquidity value of the LoopAsset and UST in the pool
TopTrading.Volume: Value of assets traded over 24 hours
TopTrading.Volume7day: Value of assets traded in 7 days
TopTrading.Fee7day: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.225% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity. Farm rewards will be added to this return when you farm your LP tokens.
TopTrading.Fee7day1: The remaining 0.075% of all trades is used to purchase LOOP at market to reward LOOP single sided staking.
TopTrading.Oracle: The oracle price changes only during market hours. During non-market hours, the price shown is the last voted price

My.TotalValue: Total value of all holdings, collateral, withdrawable liquidity, rewards, staked LOOP and UST
My.Stake: List of LP token and LOOP stake positions
My.TotalHoldingValue: Total value of all assets held
My.Balance: Quantity of the corresponding asset held
My.Value: Value of the corresponding asset held
My.PortfolioRatio: Percent allocation of the corresponding asset held
My.TotalAssetValue: Total value of all assets minted
My.TotalCollateralValue: Total value of all collateral locked
My.MintedBalance: Quantity of the corresponding asset minted
My.CollateralBalance: Quantity of collateral locked for the corresponding mint position
My.CollateralValue: Value of collateral locked for the corresponding mint position
My.CollateralRatio: Ratio of the Collateral Value to the Minted Value
My.PositionWarning: Position is close to liquidation. Close the position or deposit more collateral
My.PositionDanger: Position can be liquidated anytime upon request. Close the position or deposit more collateral
My.TotalWithdrawableValue: Total value of all Assets and withdrawable UST from liquidity pools
My.LP: Quantity of LP for the corresponding asset liquidity pool
My.Withdrawable: Quantity of withdrawable assets from the corresponding asset liquidity pool
My.PoolShare: Ratio of the liquidity provided to the total liquidity provided
My.Staked: Quantity of staked LP tokens for the corresponding asset liquidity pool
My.Reward: Quantity of claimable rewards for the corresponding staking position
My.GovReward: Protocol fee paid from withdrawing collateral is distributed to LOOP stakers and increases staked LOOP

Forms.TxFee: Fee paid to execute this transaction

Send.ShuttleFee: A fee of 1 UST or 0.1% of the transfer amount (whichever is greater) will be charged for transferring assets from Terra to Ethereum/BSC through Shuttle

Trade.General: The amount of asset traded is automatically calculated based on the current price, spread, and commission
Trade.Price:
Price is based on the pool ratio. The effective price changes dynamically depending on the trade size.

• Spread: Fee paid due to the difference between market price and estimated price.
• Commission: Fee charged by the protocol that is automatically deducted from the assets that user receives
Trade.MinimumReceived: Expected minimum quantity to be received based on the current price, maximum spread, and commission
Trade.SlippageTolerance: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage

Mint.Open: New assets will be minted when collateral is deposited. Any price change of either the collateral or the minted assets may lead to liquidation
Mint.Caution: When the position drops below minimum collateral ratio, any user may immediately liquidate the position
Mint.ExpectedMintedAsset: Expected quantity of assets received with above collateral
Mint.CollateralRatio: Ratio of the collateral value to the minted value
Mint.MinCollateralRatio: Minimum collateral ratio. When the position drops below this value, any user may immediately liquidate the position
Mint.Price: Price of the corresponding asset that is determined by the oracle feeder

Pool.Provide: Provide liquidity to receive LP tokens. LP tokens can be staked to earn LOOP token rewards
Pool.Withdraw: Withdraw asset liquidity provided by burning LP tokens
Pool.InputAsset: Quantity of assets to be added to the corresponding asset liquidity pool
Pool.InputUST: Corresponding required amount of UST added to the liquidity pool
Pool.LP: Quantity of LP tokens to be burned
Pool.Output: Estimated quantity of LoopAsset and UST to be received
Pool.PoolShare: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.225% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity. Farm rewards will be added to this return when you farm your LP tokens.
Pool.PoolFarmingWizard: Ratio of the liquidity provided to the total liquidity provided post-transaction
Pool.LPfromTx: Quantity of LP tokens to be received
Pool.PoolRec: Earn more LOOP by pooling your tokens now and you'll automatically earn farming rewards

Stake.MIRprice: Loopswap price of LOOP that is determined by the current pool ratio
Stake.MIRvolume: Total value of LOOP traded in the last 24 hours
Stake.Title: LP tokens can be staked to earn LOOP as rewards. LP tokens are obtained by providing asset liquidity
Stake.APR: Annualized LP staking return based on the LOOP distribution, LP staking ratio, and pool value
Stake.TotalStaked: Quantity of LP tokens staked for the corresponding asset liquidity pool

Gov.TotalStaked: Total quantity of LOOP tokens staked
Gov.StakingRatio: Ratio of the quantity of staked LOOP tokens to the total quantity of LOOP
Gov.APR: Annualized LOOP staking return based on the LOOP distribution and staking ratio
Gov.Polls: Staked LOOP can be used as voting power in polls that are currently in progress
Gov.Ticker: Ticker of asset to be whitelisted
Gov.ListedExchange: Exchange that the underlying asset trades on
Gov.LPcommission: Percentage of the receiving amount from the trade sent to the liquidity pool
Gov.OwnerCommission: Percentage of the receiving amont from the trade distributed to LOOP holders
Gov.AuctionDiscount: Discount rate applied to collateral sold in liquidation auction
Gov.MinimumCollateralRatio: Lowest collateral ratio which users can set to mint new assets. Position will be liquidated below this ratio
Gov.Deposit: Passing the quorum will return the deposit to the creator. Failure to pass quorum will distribute the deposit to all LOOP stakers
Gov.Quorum: Minimum quorum required for accepting a poll (in percentage)
Gov.Threshold: Minimum percentage of YES votes to pass a poll (in percentage)
Gov.VotingPeriod: Length of poll (in units of blocks)
Gov.EffectiveDelay: Length of delay before protocol integration for a passed poll (in units of blocks)
Gov.ExpirationPeriod: Length of expiration period when for a failed poll (in units of blocks)
Gov.ProposalDeposit: Minimum deposit to start a poll (in units of LOOP)
